pages.title: Enigmatic Legacy
pages.text: Enigmatic Legacy includes a lot of unique curios and items. Some can be crafted and others can only be found out in the world.$(br2)These are only a few of the items included in the mod.

pages.title: The Cursed Relics
pages.text: There are unique relics that you can only use once you've equiped the Ring of the Seven Curses.
